name: House of Kraxus
description:
16 bit adventure RPG with turn based strategy combat

Controls

  • Move – Arrow keys or WASD
  • Run – Hold Shift
  • Interact and scroll through dialog – Space bar
  • Pause – Escape

In Battle

In the movement phase, select one character to move. You will see what stat buffs or debuffs will be applied over each location. You can only move one space from where the character currently is. During the action phase, choose to Attack the enemy, Defend against their attacks for 50% increased Defence, Swap characters (currently disabled) or attempt to Flee the battle. After everyone has had their turn, including the enemy, you can use an item to heal. If one of your party members goes down, you can use the rest of a potion to heal them. If all members go down, you lose the game.
